website_summaries.verdict: A common ceiling fan light kit that makes upgrading the fan lighting quick and painless. Best used with other Hunter Fan Company ceiling fans.
pros: We love the energy efficiency, especially paired with same-company ceiling fans
Fits a wide range of fan styles
cons: Light kit is bulky and heavy

customer_reviews.title: Now I Can See!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great to replace a 3 light candelabra light with a 4 light medium base light kit. Unfortunately Hunter seems to want to put the candelabra base lamps with many of their fans and quite frankly the light output from a candelabra bulb is probalby 60% of a medium base so it's just too dark. Another downside to having to buy this is I pretty much doubled the cost of the fan versus if this were included with the fan to begin with instead of the candelabra fixture. But as far as this kit goes, it worked great, easy to replace and matches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Element07

customer_reviews.title: Wiring is simple, install is not
customer_reviews.text: My reason to replace the light kit was to add more bulbs (more light) so I purposely selected the Hunter light kit. The wiring is easy - no cutting, stripping, or twist connectors. The biggest downside is the mounting screws are too short and don’t align with the holes in the housing covers. I have one in and will drill the other (and probably get longer screws). This has been pointed out in other reviews so it must be a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Beastie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Don't give up! It works!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the globe version of this fan, to replace an old fan with 5 lights. But it did not provide enough light so I bought this. I was getting ready to return it after my boyfriend said it wouldn't work, when I decided I should take a look at it and ACTUALLY READ THE INSTRUCTIONS! Sure enough, I figured it out. I dont know what men have against instruction, ego? Curious. Personally I would think failure and being out started by a woman in installation, would be more of a boon to the male ego, but apparently not. The lights look fantastic and now we have more than enough light in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Meyers

customer_reviews.title: lighting of 4 fixtures fixed our need!
customer_reviews.text: I had only one small problem with the screws that attached to the housing was a tad short. Bought screws a 1 1/2 inches long. But love having four lights! Also went to Habitat Restore and paid $1 each for light covers.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install that my husband did it in my office while I was working, and I really didn’t notice he was there. Now, we have our beautiful glass lamp shades up. (We bought them in 2003. They haven’t been up since 2006, when we moved among several houses. Miraculously, the movers didn’t break them. But I digress.). My lights look amazing, thanks to this fan doohickey.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ann Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: 4 Star rating because of the screw issue described below. The unit is excellent build, matches perfectly and fits the old light mounting fixture. To install, the old fixture must be partially disassembled in order to attach the new fixture. As many, many other reviews have mentioned, THE SCREWS ARE TOO SHORT. NOT SURE WHY HUNTER CAN’T FIX THIS ISSUE BY SENDING LONGER SCREWS!!! Great replacement, but be prepared to get longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the two bulb dome fixture that came with the light. Four lights with globes transforms the room. Fixture looks like it has always been there. The electrical connectors plugged right into the existing fan. Took the advice of previous reviews and bought 6-32 1 1/2" long machine screws to attach to the fan housing. The supplied screws were too short. Came with four LED bulbs (40 watt equivalent) that worked well. Does not come with globes so I picked some up at Home Depot. They have many styles to choose from. My only regret is that I didn't install this earlier. I have been living in a cave for ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one was almost perfect. My fan is black with brown wood blades
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Hunter fan that needed a different light kit. This one was almost perfect. My fan is black with brown wood blades. The light is aged bronze which blends daily well. I wanted to replace the shiny brass and white ball globes when one was broken. This gave me the more rustic look I wanted. In fact, it was the only one I could find to replace the light kit due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I'd also like to say that the screws that come with it did fit although I had purchased longer ones based on prior reviews. I don't know why fans are made with such low light bulbs these days? It is ridiculous! Now I have nice bright dimmable bulbs and we can see clearly when we need to, and relax with lower light in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Matches my fan perfectly. Easy to install, all wires were provided. I was missing 3 of the globe set screws. They weren't in packaging, 1 was loose in the box. All the others were screwed into the globe housing. So only missing 2. I used 2 from my old fan light, only they are brass colored. I colored them with a marker. Not perfect but ok until I remember to buy some paint.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: This is a good match except for the screws
customer_reviews.text: used it to replace the bowl as it only had 2 candelabra style bulbs. This is a good match except for the screws. As a previous review said go and pick up #6 - 32 x 1 1/2" screws. It is a 10 minute project once you have that. All you need is a phillips screwdriver. Everything else is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Ima Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but hard to install.
customer_reviews.text: Guys, the other reviews don't lie. You can make this fit, but not after some pushing and shoving, swearing, and almost giving up. The holes for the screws didn't line up quite right and we thought we'd have to send it back, but we finally got it in enough to screw the base together. Be prepared! Once that's over though, the fan looks quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Hunter quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for non Hunter fans because the look was best match for our fans. Had to add a couple of pieces to work with our fans but they look as good now as we hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance L Hays

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to add some lighting to my back patio. the color matched perfect and easy to install. Even came with light bulbs! I read a few reviews about the screw not being long enough but mine were the right length so hunter might have resolved that issue already.
customer_reviews.author: Leoncio lopez

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, doesn't fit my fan, which is in the model number range
customer_reviews.text: The description said, quote, "Compatible with: Hunter Fan model numbers 2xxxx Types A – Z, 51000-58999 fan series..." and my fan is a 55043. The diameter is completely wrong to replace the existing light. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Olddesertguy

customer_reviews.title: Great light little hard to install
customer_reviews.text: The lights really light up the large room. The tip about longer screws really helped. Had to have it installed however because the original fan did not have the clips.
customer_reviews.author: Harold C. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Unit OK but required minor adjustment
customer_reviews.text: One mounting hole was off and I had to drill a new one but otherwise this was fine and I would have given it more stars. I really wanted black finish to match the fan housing but that is not available in a 4 light fitter so this will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Hunter not harbor
customer_reviews.text: I returned because I bought the wrong product. It was nice. Nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.author: mary hedgecock

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan light kit base
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like what came with my ceiling fan and wanted to customize the light kit to my taste. Both large hardware chains in my area had the exact kit but not in stock. Amazon Prime had much quicker delivery date (2 day), which actually delivered the very next day! Packing was great, no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Nava

customer_reviews.title: Light for older Hunter fans
customer_reviews.text: Workid perfect in a 30 year old Hunter fan. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shuttermansi

customer_reviews.title: Light Kit works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light to replace the light that originally came with our ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Basket Chick

customer_reviews.title: Not actually compatible with all 5 series fans!
customer_reviews.text: Not actually compatible with the Hunter 53155 despite the claim it fits all 5 series fans. It's a completely different size and has a different type of wire connection.
customer_reviews.author: L Creed

customer_reviews.title: Ordered New Bronze, Rec'd White
customer_reviews.text: I would like to trade this for the correct color. Understanding i missed the month return by a week, i was on travel for 3 weeks and didn't have time to open to look until this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer--K2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on the Hunter Fan that I purchased separately
customer_reviews.author: Charles DD

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, need your own screws
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on my 2xxxx series hunter fan. As many others have said the two screws to attach it are not long enough. You will need to get two 1.5” 6-32 screws to complete the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than the light kit that came with the fan
customer_reviews.author: nvrifle

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on existing fan. We bought amber glass covers and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: My3Bs

customer_reviews.title: Item did not have the part I needed attached to ...
customer_reviews.text: Item did not have the part I needed attached to it as my electrician stated “it’s supposed to be included.”
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ridgley

customer_reviews.title: Slight Hiccup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for my lighting needs. Existing fan had a upward facing bowl with candelabra bulbs which did not put out enough light. Matched existing fan finish perfectly. Would have knocked it down one-half star, if I could, because of the issue I had with the length of the mounting screws supplied with the light fitter. In my configuration they were too short to get started into the switch housing. After fumbling with for over 30 minutes, realized it would not work so gave up and went to the hardware store and picked up #6 - 32 x 1 1/2" screws. Came home and fitter was attached to housing in less than two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: wacoed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes perfectly with our Hunter Low Profile fan! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Parents of 5

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what we hoped it would be. We’re very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Harper

customer_reviews.title: One of the light socket didn't work
customer_reviews.text: One of the light socket was flickering and tried many other bulbs and got the same results
customer_reviews.author: Andoy Derp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of work to place but the directions helped. looks as though it came with my fan
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, Not the exact same color of my fan. its a shiny brown, Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pousson II

customer_reviews.title: I love it, and it seems to working great
customer_reviews.text: Put our fan together today. I love it, and it seems to working great.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's Park

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I first thought
customer_reviews.text: Easily replaced the fixture with the single bowl type globe.
customer_reviews.author: James Pate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to go with my fan!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon & Roger Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice unit, but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I have a Hunter fan that originally had the big bowl, which one day broke. Replaced with this. It's a nice piece, decent finish and I love that it takes regular E26 bulbs instead of the candelabras. However, that's where my pleasure ends. My unit was missing two of the retaining screws for the shrouds/glass and one of the mounting screws. I had to wing it.
customer_reviews.author: DenisBaldwin

customer_reviews.title: We wish this fitter would have been in the fan ...
customer_reviews.text: We wish this fitter would have been in the fan to start with, but now we have 4 conventional base lights instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, couldn't get anyone in the home stores to help, found it here.... looks great works great!
customer_reviews.author: nonameguy

customer_reviews.title: I can see now!
customer_reviews.text: This light kit was an excellent low cost way to update my ceiling fan. Product was very good quality and installed easy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This light kit does NOT work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work as advertised and after repeated calls to customer service they have refused to replace the defective part.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Matched perfect, easy to install. I only wish it came WITH the fan already.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Clagg

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Looks great. My chain pull works again!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Instructions were simple and it was a cinch to wire. The fixture matches my existing fan 100% and I switched out the bulbs for LEDs with no problem. Glad to be back in the light again. :)
customer_reviews.author: James Ettwein

product_meta.title: Hunter 99143 Four Light Fitter, New Bronze
product_meta.description: Once you`ve found the perfect Fan, add the right touches with our assortment of fixtures. Each are made with the same quality and innovation that go into every Hunter Collection. Check the pin connections in the light kit
feature_bullets: Uses Four 13 Watt Compact Fluorescent Bulbs (Included)
CFL bulbs last up to 10 times longer, use about 75% less energy and save about 60 over the life of the bulbs
Damp rated for outdoor and indoor use in covered areas such as porches, patios, sunrooms, bathrooms and other spaces exposed to moisture and humidity
Compatible with: 51XXX – 55XXX Hunter fan series, other select Hunter fans and select Casablanca fans

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
